name: concat_jsons
description: Merges multiple JSON files that match a pattern into one. The function searches for files based on the provided pattern, reads their content, and combines them into a single JSON file. The merged file can be saved to a specified directory or the directory of the first matched file.

save_dir.description: The directory to save the merged file. If not provided, the merged file will be saved in the same directory as the first matched file.

file_name.description: The name of the merged file. Defaults to "concat_data.json".
